name: global-state-management-library
description: state management library that are not dependent on the framework

scripts.build:examples: for d in ./examples/*/ ; do (cd "$d" && npm run build); done
scripts.install:examples: for d in ./examples/*/ ; do (cd "$d" && npm install); done
scripts.update:examples: for d in ./examples/*/ ; do (cd "$d" && npm update); done
